synopsis: At 3:00 PM today, the center of Tropical Depression (TD) "ADA" was estimated based on all available data at 570 km East of Hinatuan, Surigao del Sur (8.1°N, 131.5°E) with maximum sustained winds of 45 km/h near the center and gustiness of up to 55 km/h. It is moving West Northwestward at 10 km/h. Northeast Monsoon affecting Northern Luzon.
